content: {"name": "Greater Groveport Human Needs Food Pantry", "alternate_name": "", "description": "You will have 15 minutes to select your items which will provide approximately 5 days (15 meals) of food for your family. A volunteer will walk along to assist you. We offer a CHOICE PANTRY SYSTEM, which means you select, per section, the items you need and like on a point system, based on your family size.\nIf you make an appointment that you are unable to keep, you MUST contact us before 6:00 pm on the day of your appointment. Failure to contact us will result in your having to wait 30 days before rescheduling.", "email": "", "url": "roveportfoodpantry.com", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "595 Cherry Street", "address_2": null, "city": "South Columbus", "state_province": "OH", "postal_code": "43125", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 39.8506502, "longitude": -82.8841874}, "phones": [{"number": "(614) 836-7652", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "19:00", "closes_at": "22:00"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "OFFERING", "attribute_value": "Clients can visit: Once a month"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Call in advance for services"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Bring ID and proof of residence"}, {"attribute_key": "OFFERING", "attribute_value": "Emergency food available. Call to inquire."}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Appointments required"}]}
